NOTHINGAcept the cockroach in the bath room I had to spent the night with the hotel double charged me and did not respond to my mail My colleague was interrupted midnight by another guest trying to entre due to reception mistake and had to answer stupid questions by the receptionistTerible hotel

I had family and a large group of friends come in from out of town on Friday March 11 and when we returned to the hotel after a hockey game there was a large group of people hanging outside the entrance drinking beer and throwing the bottles into the bushes and revving their motorcycles loudly
Elevator is questionable hot and humid
The new concrete in entrance way and paving stones on entrance drive were being sealed with a protective coat this morning when I was trying to have breakfast
With only one elevator in the front for all floors you may want to drive around back and park there depending where your room is
